summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated August 9, 2019. It details staff posts, shifts, assignments, and changes for correctional officers and other personnel, including records of sick leave, annual leave, and overtime. The document appears to be a routine administrative log for the facility.

persons.name: Thomas, FA
persons.context: Listed as being on Sick/Annual leave, with their post (11 SOUTH) being reassigned.

persons.context: Listed as being on Sick/Annual leave, with their post (SHU 02) being reassigned.

persons.name: Vieca, J
persons.context: Appears as a relieving officer for the CONTROL #2 post.

keyFacts: The document is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 9, 2019.
It details posts, shifts, and personnel changes, indicating routine administrative operations of the facility.
Several officers (Thomas, FA; Thomas, M; Durant, J) are noted as being on Sick or Annual leave.
The roster includes various posts such as SHU (Special Housing Unit), ATTY CONE (Attorney Contact), LOBBY, and CONTROL.
The document records overtime occurrences (29) and comptime occurrences (0) for the day.
